article:
This is a list of early talking movies produced, co-produced, and/or distributed
by Warner Bros. and its subsidiary First National for the years 1927-1931.

:'Films released in 1930 and after are [[talkie|All-Talking]]'. No further Part-
:Talkies, Synchronized Scored or Silent Films were released.
